1.content: who wil be the first?
1.title: The lovely couple

111.content:
It has been two months since Natsuru and the others captured Sakura and put her in a mental reabilitation center. now Sakura has escaped. what will she do?
Natsuru was one day walking to school when out of one corner a familiar girl pops up. "Hey Natsuru! Come here! Want to walk to school with me?" Sakura says. (Oh crap! Sakura is out of the Mental Hospital! What kind of torture will she do to me?) Natsuru thinks. Natsuru walks over to Sakura. "Hey Sakura. So you got out of the mental hospital?" Natsuru asks. "Yeah I got out yesterday! " Sakura says happily. Sakura puts her hand in her bag to grab something. "AAHH DON'T HURT ME!" Natsuru suddenly screams. "Hmm? What's wrong Natsuru? Im not gonna hurt you."sakura says. She takes out a small packaged bundle. "Here Natsuru! these are rice balls! I made them as a token of forgivness to you and your friends. Look im really sorry. For everything. You know, attacking you, sending my white kampfer to attack you, controling you, and almost killing your friends. Sending me to that mental hospital was the best thing you could do for me. You didn't send me to jail or anything. Well anyways bieng at that mental hospital made me think of two important things." Sakura said. "Oh? Well what are they?" Natsuru asked suspiciously. "Number one, how much im sorry and how much your friendship means to me and two... well... umm... well you." Sakura answered. "Me? Well ok. I accept your appology but this is your last chance." Natsuru responded. "Oh thank you Natsuru! I promise i won't attack you or your friends again! Well I wanted to ask you something." Sakura asked giving Natsuru a big hug. "Hmm?" Natsuru asked. "Are you dating anyone?" Sakura asked. "No. A lot of people have tried making a move on me though." Natsuru said. "Well then... umm.... would you... will you go on a date with me?" Sakura asked.
111.title: True love

1111.content:
Sakura has just asked Natsuru on a date! This is so romantic! Well im a stuffed animal so i shouldnt know. Will natsuru answer or is this all a big dream?
"Will you go on a date with me?" Sakura asked. "Hmm let me think.................Nope." Natsuru answered back. "Huh? Why not?" Sakura said with tears in her eyes. "I remember that the last time we spoke... hmm let me react it." Natsuru says. "EWW A BOY! GET OFF ME YOU FILTHY MALE!. SLAP But Kaede! SLAP SLAP SLAP SLAP Don't even think about calling me Kaede you filthy male!" Natsuru reinacted. "But Natsuru that was.... that was before I... before I.... before I had feelings for you. Im different now. I swear!" Sakura said with tears flowing like a river out of her eyes. "The answer is still no. I may have forgiven you but there's been too much between us for me to go out with you. Im sorry but good bye." Natsuru said. "But wait! Natsuru! Don't go! Really ive changed! Don't leave!" Sakura cried. "Good bye and that's final! Now let go of me!" Natsuru said kicking her away. "Natsuru... please! I really like you. Please don't go!" Sakura pleaded. "Come on hurry up we're going to be late!" Natsuru shouted. Sakura ran away with tears flowing out of her eyes.
1111.title: Continued story

11111.content: Natsuru bumps into Akane and Mikoto at school. "Hey Akane!Mikoto! You'll never beleive who popped up today! Sakura is back!" Natsuru said. "What?! Did she attack you?" Mikoto said. "No she didn't. She gave me a package of homemade riceballs to share with you guys. She also apologized and asked me out!" Natsuru said. "What? Did you say yes?!" Akane said transforming into a kampfer. "Nope. I said there was too much that happened between us for me to go out with her." Natsuru said. "Well good! 'Cause i wanted to ask you something too. Would you like to go out with me?" Mikoto asked. "out of the way! Would you like to go out with me?" Akane(kampfer) says. "Umm please wait your calls shall be answered in a few days." Natsuru said running away. "Whew! Wow three girls asking me out in one day.
11111.title: Later at School

111111.content:
"Well even though I already said no to Sakura I guess I have to say yes to her. Anyways I liked her first and she didn't like me before and now she likes me." Natsuru says. Natsuru goes to Sakura's place after school. KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK. "Sniff-Who is-Sniff- it?" Sakura said. "It's me!" Natsuru answered. "Go away.
"Sakura says. "Sakura ive come to talk about "us" okay." natsuru says. "Come in the doors open" Sakura says. Natsuru comes inside. "What do you want to talk about?" Sakura says with tears still coming out of her eyes. "Well ive made my decision about the date. Sure i'll go out with you." Natsuru said happily. "Huh? What made you change your mind?" Sakura said getting happier by the second. "Well when i got to school I told Akane and Mikoto about you asking me out and then they asked me out. I'd feel more comfortable with you than them. So where are we going?" Natsuru said. "I guess to the movies? I heard there's this new entrails love story movie!" Sakura said. "Sure. Anywhere you want to go." Natsuru said with a smile on his face.
111111.title: The decision

1111111.content:
Natsuru and Sakura arrive at the movies both dressed nicely."you look awfully nice to watch a movie."Natsuru says. "Thanks Natsuru! you look great too." Sakura says. Natsuru and Sakura buy popcorn and soda. The movie begins.


TIME SKIP


Halfway through the movie the big scene begins."Oh prince of muscles and bones I love thee ,but alas we can not be together for our kingdoms are rivals. You can not be seen with me the princess of vessles and veins." the princess says. " I do not care my fair maiden!Our love was meant to be! I shall face thy king if it means bieng with you the one i hold dearest to my heart. I shall be stabbed 1,000 times for you if i need to prove myself to your father." the prince answers. As the prince and princess are about to kiss so are Natsuru and Sakura. Just as their lips touch SMASH. "What the hell are you doing with my partner bitch!" Kampfer Akane shouts. "AAAHHH SAVE ME NATSURU!"Sakura screams "OH YEAH? WELL WHY DONT YOU JUST CALL ON YOUR FRIENDS HUH SHITHEAD? Akane shouts. "Stop Akane! Calm down! I know you won't shoot me. You don't have the strength to. If you shoot me or Sakura I will never forgive you! I will never even look at you again!" Natsuru says. "OH YEAH BITCH! PREPARE TO DIE THEN!" Akane shouts. "Any...any second now.... im.... im gonna shoot you... prepare to die... here i go." Akane says while calming down. Natsuru waited and waited but it never came. "I-I I just cant. I-I I love you too much to shoot you" Akane says slowly turning back to normal. "Erm I should probably take her home now so see ya tommorrow i guess." Natsuru says.
1111111.title: The movies

11111111.content: Natsuru was walking to school the next day. (Man i feel really bad about leaving Sakura alone yesterday at the movies. I wonder if she would even look at me again without tears in her eyes. Man I screwed up big time. I should go apologize to her.) Natsuru thinks. Just a few seconds later Sakura pops up with a frown and tears in her eyes. "Hey Sakura. Look im real-" Natsuru was cut off. "Sniff- I was-Sniff- I was lonely yesterday.-Sniff- Why did you leave me yesterday?-Sniff- I didnt even get to ask you something yesterday." Sakura cried. "Hey you didnt let me finish. i wanted to say... im sorry i left you yesterday. Is there anyway I can make it up to you?" Natsuru said. "Sniff-Well can you meet me at the ally around my house at 12 midnight?" Sakura asked. "Yeah sure! Anything to make it up to you!" Natsuru exclaimed. Sakura gave Natsuru a big hug. "Thank you! From now on you can call me Kaede. And one more thing." Sakura said cheering up a bit. "Huh? What is that?" Natsuru asked. "I love you Natsuru. Now hurry up we'll be late for class!" Sakura said happily. "Umm Yeah sure! I love you too." Natsuru said.
11111111.title: tommorrow

111111112.content: Natsuru arived at the alley. "Kaede!? Kaede are you there?" Natsuru shouted. Slash Slash slash. Everything went black. When Natsuru awoke he was tied in a chair. "Silly boys. They're always so stupid." Sakura said. "Kaede! Why are you doing this?! I thought you liked me!" Natsuru exclaimed. "Ah that was just a trick. I lured you just where I wanted you. Im doing this for revenge! It was a shame though. I was actually beggining to like you." Sakura said. "UGH LET ME OUT OF THIS!" Natsuru exclaimed. Just then Natsuru turned into a Kampfer and blue flames of rage came out and the rope broke. "If you liked me then why did you do this?" Natsuru asked. "I-i-i don't know. I'm-I'm just... just confused. I don't know what...what I should do. Oh what should I do? Should I kill you or should...should I let you go free? I dont know what to do. Im so sorry." Sakura said as she feinted.
111111112.title: The alley(Bad choice)

1111111121.content: "Wha What? Where...where am I?" Sakura asked. "you're at my house. You feinted so I brought you to my place for the night. You have a fever so i decided to cut school and check up on you." Natsuru answered. "Wow you...you skipped school to make sure I was ok? Thank you." Sakura said very weakly. "You're welcome.This still doesn't mean I forgive you for tieing me up at that alley. That's also why you're leaving right after your fever drops down." Natsuru said. "But...but i'm sorry. I didn't mean to do that to you. I was...I was-Sniff-confused.-sniff-Im sorry. You-Sniff-forgive me-Sniff-right?" Sakura said with tears about to flow out. "No i'm afraid I don't. i gave you another chance and you blew it. No more chances. I won't forgive you anymore." Natsuru says. "But...But Im-Im sorry.PLEASE FORGIVE ME! I DIDN'T MEAN TO!" Sakura cries. "Uhh wait no please don't cry! It's okay really! I forgive you! Just please don't cry!" Natsuru pleaded. Sakura gave Natsuru a big hug AGAIN. "Oh thank you Natsuru!" Sakura said. "Uh yeah sure anytime Kaede-chan." Natsuru said with a sigh of relief. " Oh Natsuru one more thing. I have a present for you!" Sakura said with a big smile on her face. "Hmm?"Natsuru asked. "Just close your eyes and don't move!" Sakura said with great excitement.
1111111121.title: continue

112.content: Natsuru is at class while the teacher is just staring at him. Natsuru hadn't noticed though because he had been drawing something, or someone. "Mr. Senou! Did you here what I said? Eh? What's this? A picture? Hmmm this girl looks strangley like one of the librarians! Erm, what was her name again? I think it was Akane Mishima! And on the other side it has a red headed girl with our uniform on holding a gun! How long has it taken you to make this!" the teacher asked. "Three months sir." said an embarresed Natsuru. Sakura had been caught and put in a mental hospital for awhile so Natsuru got feelings for one of his friends. "Three months?! Good lord you must really like her! Well just because you spent a long time on this i'll let you keep it! But you need to write me a 1000 word essay on how sorry you are for skipping class and not paying attention during class!" the teacher said. "Thank you sir! I promise i'll listen more now." Natsuru once again said embarresed. "May the lesson continue!" The teacher shouted.
112.title: Akane Mishima

1121.content: Akane was walking home after school. After that kiss with Natsuru(episode 12) she had gotten braver when talking to him. Although Natsuru had gotten more shy. "Hey Akane wait up!" Natsuru said running after her. "Huh? Oh hey Natsuru. so what did you need?" Akane asked. "I wanted to give you something. just let me take it out." Natsuru said. Natsuru took out a drawing from his backpack. Natsuru handed it to Akane. "Huh? I-Is this supposed to be me? It looks great. it's perfect. There are no mistakes. How long did it take you to make this?" Akane said shyly. "Three months. Flip it around." Natsuru said. And so she did. "It's me as a Kampfer! Thanks Natsuru, that's sweet of you." Akane said. (Wow he drew this? D-Does that mean he chose me?) Akane thought. "So Akane I wanted to ask you something. Do you by any chance... well... do you want to go on a picnic with me?" Natsuru said shyly. (he did choose me! I cant believe it! He chose me!) Akane thought. Akane feinted. "Akane?Akane?" Natsuru asked.
1121.title: After school

11211.content: "What? Huh? Where-Where am I?" Akane asked. "you're at your house. I brought you here after you feinted at the sidewalk. You have a fever. I think you should just lie down until you get better." Natsuru said. "Oh Natsuru I had a dream where you gave me a picture of myself and then you.... you asked me out. I don't feel so good." Akane said. "Umm Akane that wasn't a dream. That happened a few minutes ago. I still haven't gotten my answer. Do you still wanna go? Natsuru asked. "Huh? Go? On a picnic? With you? Alone?" Akane asked nervously. "Yeah it would just be us in a big empty field. Kinda like a date. So what do you say?" Natsuru asked. "Ummm... uhh...yeah...s-sure Natsuru." Akane said getting red in the face. "Well see ya then Akane." Natsuru said. (YES! i got a date with Akane!) Natsuru thought. "Wait! Aren't you going to stay here until I get better? You know... check up on me?" Akane asked. "Umm yeah sure Akane, if you really want me to. " Natsuru said. (SCORE! Natsuru is staying at my house, AND I'm going on a picnic with him! ALONE!) Akane thought.
11211.title: Akane's house

choices: Blushed and decided to learn more about "herself"
Became embarrassed, & decided to take K. Natsuru w/ him and see what was happeni
115.content:
One day Natsuru had came across a strange, magical mirror while in town. It was left outside in an alley, and had caught his eye as he walked around.

Something drew him to the mirror and he walked to it, only to see his Kampfer form in the mirror.

"Wha? But I'm normal right now..." He said to himself. He touched the mirror and a moment later his female form popped out.

"Huh?" Both Natsurus said.

"You're the female me!" Natsuru cried out.

"Yeah I am...I thought I was inside of you though but I guess not now." She told him, " I never noticed how cute I was..."

The boy Natsuru...
115.title: Natsuru loves himself?

1153.content:
1.) Does Natsuru transform into his female kampfer form which results in a yuri pairing?

2.) Will an unexpected attack cause Natsuru become a female besides the female Natsuru beside him?

You can choose other options.
1153.title: other options

11531.content: Is it a gradual change or an instant change?
11531.title: option 1

choices: One of the boys in natsuru's class
One of the Girls in Natsuru's class
15.title: more
